he grounds urged by the petitioner in this application are as follows:
a)  The  said  order  is  totally  contrary  to  the  statutory  law  and  the  well-
b)  The  Learned  Trial  Judge  has  totally  failed  and  neglected  to  evaluate
duly  and  to  consider  the  vital  facts  and  the  documentary  evidence  in
arriving at his findings, and thereby, Justice is denied to the petitioner
c)  The Learned trial Judge has entered the order without duly analysing
and considering the legal provisions, especially relating to the Recovery
of Possession of Premises Given on Lease, Act No. 01 of 2023.
